item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meeup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Aspire on Westminster St. across from the red stone church in downtown Providence

Katie is leaving us and is New Jersey-bound! Come down to Aspire for some fun and good cheer, as we wish her well and toast her good-bye! *sniff*. Aspire has big windows, and a large central bar that make this restaurant a fun airy place with a warm, but contemporary atmosphere. They have a lovely outside patio too. Its a great place to go on a summer night AND they have jazz on the roof on Fridays! The drinks and appetizers are good too, so let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing some kind of scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup and Bon Voyage to Katie at Aspire!!!!
